pages.text: Cultivation realms are split into 3 martial realms:$(li)Mortal Realm$(li)True Realm$(li)Divine Realm
$(bold)Mortal Martial Realm$()$(br)In this martial realm, there are 3 realms of cultivation:$(li)Mortal$(li)Body Tempering$(li)Qi Gathering
$(bold)True Martial Realm$()$(br)In this martial realm, there are 4 realms of cultivation:$(li)Foundation Establishment$(li)Core Formation$(li)Golden Core$(li)Nascent Soul
$(bold)True Martial Realm$()$(br)In this martial realm, there are 4 realms of cultivation:$(li)Foundation Establishment$(li)Core Formation$(li)Golden Core$(li)Nascent Soul
$(bold)Divine Martial Realm$()$(br)In this martial realm, there are 3 realms of cultivation:$(li)Half-Step Saint$(li)Saint$(li)Return To Origin
At the end of the Divine Martial Realm, there is an unknown cultivation realm that mortals call $(bold)Immortality$().
